name: Consumables
description: Items that don't fit anywhere else.

**Alcohol:** Acts like a poison and is able to mask poisons that are mixed with it. If a creature consumes a number of drinks with the *Alcoholic* trait above their Constitution modifier, each new drink will require a DC 13 Fortitude save or gain the Clumsy 1 condition which can progress with further consumption. The Clumsy condition ends after an 8 hour rest.

equipment.name: Dekatrian Wine (1 bottle)
equipment.body: Dekatrian Wine is one of the most famous drinks in the world and is the main export of Sweetrose, a city on the eastern border of Dekatreis. Upon drinking Dekatrian Wine, you gain a +1 Status bonus on skill checks made with Charsima or Strength for the next minute.
